lst.name: sentence
lst.str: On a marginal cost basis, the companies that have made capital investment to handle LNG import can operate profitably even in the current price environment," Frank Spadine, an energy economist with Bankers Trust, said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Youcef Yousfi, director-general of Sonatrach, the Algerian state petroleum agency, indicated in a television interview in Algiers that such imports would be made this year.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sonatrach is currently negotiating with two of its former customers, Panhandle Eastern <PEL> and Distrigas, a subsidiary of Cabot Corp <CBT> to resume LNG export, company officials told Reuters.
